results.Title: 2 in 1 Planner & Journal Diary
results.body: Introducing the 2 in 1 Journal and Planner by HypeBoxed, the perfect corporate gift for those seeking a stylish and eco-friendly solution to stay organized and inspired. This versatile product combines the functionality of a journal and a planner, making it an essential companion for professionals, entrepreneurs, and creative minds.Crafted with care, our 2 in 1 Journal and Planner features a hardbound cover made from plantable materials. Yes, you heard it right! Once you're done using the journal, simply plant the cover in soil and watch it sprout into beautiful plants. This unique feature reflects our commitment to sustainability and offers a tangible way to contribute to a greener future.Inside, you'll find 192 undated pages, allowing you to start your journey of organization and self-expression whenever you please. Whether you want to jot down important notes, set goals, sketch ideas, or simply unleash your creativity, this journal and planner offers ample space to capture your thoughts and plans.To help you stay organized, we've included two bookmarks, allowing you to effortlessly navigate between pages and sections. Whether you want to mark important dates, inspirational quotes, or reference points, these bookmarks are designed to keep you on track and make your journaling experience seamless.The 2 in 1 Journal and Planner from HypeBoxed is not only a practical tool but also a statement piece. Its sleek design and high-quality construction make it a sophisticated gift for clients, employees, or colleagues. By choosing this product, you're showcasing your commitment to sustainability while providing a useful and stylish gift that will be cherished.Unlock your potential, capture your dreams, and make a positive impact on the environment with the 2 in 1 Journal and Planner from HypeBoxed. Order yours today and embark on a journey of organization, creativity, and sustainability!
results.ProductCategory: Office Supplies > Filing & Organization > Calendars, Organizers & Planners

results.Title: Notepad Memo holder with Sticky Notes
results.body: Introducing the Notepad Memo Holder with Sticky Notes by HypeBoxed - Your Stylish and Practical Office CompanionUpgrade your office essentials with the Notepad Memo Holder with Sticky Notes by HypeBoxed. This pack includes yellow and pink rectangular note pads, 5 colorful sticky note index flags, and a fashionable ballpoint pen, all enclosed in a sleek black faux leather case. With its vibrant colors and stylish design, it's perfect for school, office, and home use.Versatile Sizes and Colors:The pack includes different-sized notepads and sticky notes in bright and vivid colors. The yellow rectangular notepad measures 3.9x2.9 inches, the purple rectangular notepad measures 2.9x1.9 inches, and the index flags are sized at 1.7x0.47 inches. The included notepad measures 6.5x3.8 inches, providing ample space for writing.Organize and Create:Unleash your creativity with the sticky notes for brainstorming sessions, jotting down new ideas, or retaining key information while studying. Keep your notes organized and easily accessible with this neat, compact, and slim memo holder. It's perfect for carrying in your bag, keeping on your desk, or storing in a drawer.Convenient and Practical:The Notepad Memo Holder with Sticky Notes is not only a useful tool but also a thoughtful gift. The combination of a fashionable ballpoint pen and a writing pad makes it an ideal gift for teachers, students, friends, or siblings. It's a must-have office supply for enterprises, schools, and government agencies.Trustworthy Brand:HypeBoxed is a brand you can trust for quality and reliability. We strive to provide you with a pleasant experience through our products. Rest assured that you're making a wise purchase with the Notepad Memo Holder with Sticky Notes.Add the Notepad Memo Holder with Sticky Notes by HypeBoxed to your cart today and elevate your office organization in style.

results.Title: Getting Things Done Productivity Planner
results.body:
Productivity is all about combining simple tricks—prioritising the most important tasks, focusing on single-tasking, and making the best use of your time. With Odd Giraffe's Productivity Planner, learn how to make the most of your time every single day and develop a habit to declutter your to-do lists and achieve maximum productivity each day.
What’s Inside
24 weeks (almost 6 months) of daily productive planning.
Daily productive planning page.
Weekly planning and weekly review routine.
Inspiring quotes to start each work day on a positive note.
Undated (yay) pages to fill out at your own pace.
Introduction to well renowned Pomodoro Technique.


24 weeks (almost 6 months) of daily productive planning.
Daily productive planning page.
Weekly planning and weekly review routine.
Inspiring quotes to start each work day on a positive note.
Undated (yay) pages to fill out at your own pace.
Introduction to well renowned Pomodoro Technique.

Whether you're attending meetings, brainstorming ideas, or organizing your thoughts, our Eco-Friendly Sticky Pad Notebook offers a versatile and practical solution. Stay organized and reduce waste with this innovative and eco-friendly gift.
